message:
Anybody using mustache.js?
I want to call a javascript function from the template

data.message: Ember documentation says you use helpers for this. Not sure whuch flavor of mustache supports this (handlebars I guess). I thjnk in mustache directly you are supposed to provide already formatted view model, hence the*logic-less* bit
or you can use the extended version of Mustache A.K.A Handlebars.
